page.title: 06THE WELSH LANGUAGE
page.content: The Welsh Language name for Fishguard is Abergwaun. It means the mouth of the river Gwaun. In our school because we don't speak much Welsh we have a special teacher in to help us learn Welsh. In our school only two people speak fluent Welsh they are the Headmaster and a 4 year old boy. Yesterday six people from Class 4 went around Fishguard to do a survey on how many shopkeepers speak Welsh and conduct their business in Welsh. We found that out of the 41 shopkeepers we asked, the amount of shopkeepers that speak Welsh was 19. The amount of shopkeepers that conduct their business in Welsh was 16. We thought this was not very many.
